assetProfile.address2: 10th Floor Century Mills Compound Pandurang Budhkar Marg, Worli
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vodafone Idea Limited operates mobile telecommunications in India. The company offers 2G, 3G, and 4G services; prepaid, postpaid, and roaming services, as well as interconnect and long distance services; voice, data, and enterprise services, as well as various other value added services, including short messaging services, digital services, Internet of Things, etc. It also trades in handsets, data cards, and related accessories; and provides internet, mobile advertisement, toll free services, etc. Vodafone Idea Limited has approximately 293.7 million mobile subscribers. The company was formerly known as Idea Cellular Limited and changed its name to Vodafone Idea Limited in August 2018. Vodafone Idea Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Mumbai, India.
